Fjern blokkering av nummer Oppheve blokkeringen av numre Vis blokkert Skjul blokkert Sette inn Recents Budskap Innstillinger-ikonet Totalt: %s Prosjektstøtte Get the paid app to support future developments and extra features Get one of our paid apps to support future development and unlock extra features Få mer informasjon PlayBooks Audiobook player VoiceMemos Voice recorder Files File manager Temaer Nøye utvalgte applikasjonstemaer, automatisk temaskifter og systemtemastøtte for Android 12+ Farger Manuell justering av primærfarge, utheving, bakgrunn, tekst og navigasjonsfelt Støtt oss Med din hjelp kan vi implementere flere funksjoner og gjøre applikasjonen enda bedre Vi verdsetter tiden din og vil at du skal nyte appen vår uten annonser. Hvis det har gitt deg glede og nytte, bør du vurdere å donere til utviklingen.

Sett pris på vårt harde arbeid og del inntrykkene dine, det vil hjelpe oss med å realisere nye ideer og tilby deg enda flere fantastiske funksjoner. Vi støtter deg Hvis du av en eller annen grunn ikke har råd til appen vår, men virkelig vil bruke alle funksjonene, er det bare å sende oss en e-post Participants Special thanks to God støtte Utmerket støtte Fantastisk støtte Støtte Unlock For those who do not use Google Play, it is possible to unlock all functions of the application.
If you like our apps which are offline, non-intrusive and have no ads, please consider supporting us in some way. We would be very grateful.

Thank you! Restored previous purchase. Please restart the app to make use of all features. No purchase found. Åpne Søk når du åpner kategorien Kontakter>. Bakgrunnen for innkallingsskjermbildet Foto av kontakten Uklart kontaktbilde Sløret bakgrunnsbilde Farge på tekstmarkør Farget applinje øverst Overløp-ikon Linjer teller Vis knappen for ikke å skjule blokkerte anrop Flash for varsler Clean Concept Mappe som skal åpnes ved appstart Sist brukt Hjem-mappen Primært SIM-kort Primær-knapp Sekundær-knapp Purchase Goodwy Thank You v %1$s\nCopyright © Goodwy %2$d Please update Goodwy Thank You to the latest version Yes, of course. You can spread the word about the apps or give good feedback and ratings. You can also help by translating the apps in a new language, or just update some existing translations. You can find the guide at this website, or just shoot me a message at goodwy.dev@gmail.com if you need help. As your app version is no longer updated, the bugs you have maybe spotted will never be fixed. There will also be no new functions added. You can purchase the Pro version on Google Play for a small sum of money. It is a one time payment, which means that once you purchase it, you will never have to pay again. Not even after getting a new device. If you won\'t like the Pro version, you can just uninstall it within a few hours and you will automatically get your money back. If you want a refund anytime later, just contact us at goodwy.dev@gmail.com and you will get it. What is a private contact? A private contact is created within an application. This contact will not be visible to other applications. If you uninstall the app, all private contacts will be deleted along with the app, so back up your contacts before uninstalling the app. How to create a private contact? When you create a contact, you must select the source of the contact: %s This list contains everyone that noticeably helped any app within the Goodwy suite, not only this one. Translations are handled by volunteers, let us know if you want to help too. The guide to translating is at this website, or just contact us at goodwy.dev@gmail.com if you have any questions. Thanks to all contributors and other supporters! DEPRECATED: This version of the app is no longer maintained, get the Pro version at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.goodwy.xxx.pro Don\'t forget that if you uninstall any paid app within 2 hours, you will automatically be refunded. If you want a refund anytime later, just contact us at goodwy.dev@gmail.com and you will get it.
